name: Pacific Road (GBJAM6)
description:
Pacific Road is a little visual novel created for the Game Boy Jam 6 (2018).

Code, art, music and fx by Óscar RB (@chocoboflo)

Keys

Press Z to advance texts

Press F1 or 1 to change resolution.

Press F2 or 2 and F3 or 3 to switch palettes.

I wanted to do a game/genre not very common on a Game Boy, so I went for a little visual novel and focused to achieve the best atmosphere I could.

By the way, thanks for playing it :)
